video_prompt: A massive, pixelated whale erupts from a fracturing cubic surface. Its fragmented body shifts from purple/blue to orange/red, scattering countless iridescent cubes. The digital background pulsates with radiating lines and glowing squares, emphasizing the explosive, upward motion.
image_prompt: A whale-like creature made of multi-colored cubes, predominantly purple/blue on its underside and orange/red on top, emerging dynamically from a surface of similar cubes. The background is a dark digital space with glowing lines and squares radiating outwards in blue, orange, and purple hues, emphasizing motion and energy.  Digital art, pixelated.
refined_video_prompt: A whale-like burst surges upward, fracturing a cubic surface. Its form shifts from cool purples and blues to fiery oranges and reds, scattering countless iridescent cubes. The digital background actively pulsates with radiating lines and glowing squares, dynamically emphasizing the powerful, explosive motion.
